issues.description: Inconsistent code formatting with project style
suggested_fixes: Keep multi-line function parameter definitions for better readability and consistency with the rest of the codebase

issues.description: Unnecessary blank line added after imports

issue_ranking.description: Inconsistent code formatting with project style
Unnecessary blank line added after imports

summary.overall_assessment: The changes consist only of minor formatting modifications to the cc_review_cli.py file. While these changes don't affect functionality, they introduce inconsistency with the existing code style in the project. The changes replace multi-line function parameter definitions with single-line formatting and add an unnecessary blank line after imports.
summary.recommendation: Consider reverting these formatting changes to maintain consistency with the existing codebase style. If a formatting change is desired, it should be applied consistently across the entire project using an automated formatter.
